item.title: Prior-itizing Privacy: A Bayesian Approach to Setting the Privacy Budget in Differential Privacy
item.description: This paper introduces a Bayesian approach to setting the privacy budget in differential privacy, enabling agencies to balance data utility and confidentiality by customizing risk profiles.
